text: Kangundo is a town in Kenya's Machakos County in the lower eastern region of Kenya. It is usually classified as being one town with Tala, due to their close proximity. ==Kangundo-Tala== Officially Kangundo-Tala's population is the 9th largest of any urban area in Kenya. Tala is part of Kangundo town council.Electoral Commission of Kenya: Registration centres by electoral area and constituency ==Towns in Machakos County== {| class="sortable wikitable" |- !
